Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ARN of the new index. For example:

arn:aws:resource-explorer-2:us-east-1:123456789012:index/EXAMPLE8-90ab-cdef-fedc-EXAMPLE22222

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The ARN of the new index for the AWS Region. For example:  arn:aws:resource-explorer-2:us-east-1:123456789012:index/EXAMPLE8-90ab-cdef-fedc-EXAMPLE22222
Indicates the current state of the index. For example:  CREATING
